ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so that what enveloped it enveloped it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So that they were covered over by what they were covered over.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and caused them to be covered with that which He covered them with.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they were covered with whatever covered them?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, there covered them that which did cover.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So there covered them that which covered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: so that there covered it that which covered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So that there covered them that which did cover.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and then covered them from sight forever.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then covered them with that which covered them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: covering it with what covered it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So that (ruins unknown) have covered them up.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So there covered them that which did cover (i.e. torment with stones).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: so that there came upon them that which came.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And covered them with whatever covered them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And covered them by that which He covered.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:54] so that there covered them, of rocks afterwards, that which covered [them]: this is [purposely] left vague in order to inspire terror; in [sūrat] Hūd [it is stated]: We made their uppermost the nethermost, and We rained upon them stones of baked clay [Q. 11:82].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So that there covered them that which did cover) i.e. stones covered them.
